verses.roman:
śāstre yei dui dharma kairāche varjana
sei karma nirantara iṅhāra karaṇa

synonyms: śāstre—in the revealed scriptures; yei—which; dui—two; dharma—activities; kairāche varjana—are rejected; sei—those; karma—activities; nirantara—always; iṅhāra—his; karaṇa—action.
translation: "The two kinds of activity rejected in the revealed scriptures constitute his daily affairs.
